entry.title: Resume
entry.content:
News

DateNameNote
2020.03 - 2020.12Time Series Anomaly Detection
Intro: Anomaly detection and interpretation with Triadic Motif Field based on Transfer Learning.
Preprint: Yadong Zhang and Xin Chen. Anomaly Detection in Time Series with Triadic Motif Fields and Application in Atrial Fibrillation ECG Classification.
Online demo: Binder

Education

DateSchoolMajor inWork
2018.09 - 2021.06Xi’an Jiaotong UniversityGraduate Student / Electrical EngineeringTime series classification and prediction.
Tutor: Xin Chen.
2014.09 - 2018.06Xi’an Jiaotong UniversityBachelor’s Degree / Electrical EngineeringTop 7/383.
Outstanding undergraduate thesis: The Prediction of Lithium-ion Battery State of Charge (SOC) based on Machine Learning.
Tutor: Xin Chen.

Work

DateCompanyNameWork
2020.07.01 - 2020.09.21MeituanMachine learning algorithm engineer / Summer internCTR prediction model. Already online.

Project

DateNameNote
2020.03 - 2020.12Time Series Anomaly Detection
Intro: Anomaly detection and interpretation with Triadic Motif Field based on Transfer Learning.
Preprint: Yadong Zhang and Xin Chen. Anomaly Detection in Time Series with Triadic Motif Fields and Application in Atrial Fibrillation ECG Classification.
Online demo: Binder
Open source code: Github
2019.10 - 2020.03Acoustic Noise Recognition PlatformIntro: Poster.
Status: Finished.
Collaborator: Other five students. Tutor: Xin Chen.
2019.03 - 2020.03Time Series ClassificationIntro: PPT.
Major work: Discover the high-order signature patterns of time series for classification.
Paper:
1. Yadong Zhang and Xin Chen. Motif Difference Field: A Simple and Effective Image Representation of Time Series for Classification. In proceeding of The 4th IEEE Conference on Energy Internet and Energy System Integration. The poster made by me.
2. Yadong Zhang and Xin Chen. Triad State Space Construction for Chaotic Signal Classification with Deep Learning.
Tool: HPC + Python3 + Keras/Tensorflow/Pytorch.
Collaborator/Tutor: Xin Chen.
2017.10 - 2018.09The Prediction of Lithium-ion Battery State of Charge (SOC) based on Machine Learning (Outstanding undergraduate thesis)Intro: Data-driven model of SOC prediction.
Major work: Establish, test and evaluate the SOC prediction models using the stream data of Lithium-ion batteries on simulated Electric Vehicle system (current, voltage, temperature, etc).
Tool: HPC + Python3 + Tensorflow.
Collaborator: Chenye Zou. Tutor: Xin Chen.
2017.05 - 2018.01QinRen WebsiteIntro: Xin Chen’s team webpage and online demos (including stock price prediction and housing price prediction).
Major work: Structure the initial framework and alpha version, and maintain the on-line website.
Tool: Ali Cloud + Flask (Python3) + Nginx. (Flask tutorial)
Collaborator: Siyu Chen, Yuxuan Sui. Tutor: Xin Chen.
2017.03 - 2017.06Object Positioning System based on Ultra Wide Band (UWB)Major work: Build the full system for positioning and tracking the objects in the room space with secondary development on the basic open-source code of the UWB1000 module. (Error rate: 5%)
Hardware: Arduino + UWB1000 + Bluetooth + Accelerometer.
Software: Matlab GUI + Kalman Filter.
2016.10 - 2017.06Stock Price ForecastingMajor work: Predict stock price with recurrent-neural-network model-families considering the historical informations, which include the sentiment of crawled news titles and other financial indicators.
Tool: Python2.7 + Tensorflow.
Tutor: Xin Chen.

Scholarship

2018Principal Freshmen Scholarships (PFS) + Principal Academic Scholarships (PAS)Top 7/383 in post-graduate recommendation. There are no more than 50 students to win PFS and 20% to win PAS in university.
2017Shunde Zhizao Scholarships-
2016National ScholarshipsTop 1.8% (7/383) in the college.
2015Siyuan Electrical Scholarships-
2014Yuying ScholarshipsGrade-A in the independent recruitment test and high performance in the college entrance examination.
